channel.title: [Procedure]FindFightStyle

item.title: [Procedure]FindFightStyle
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Well, It isnâ€™t super usefull, but maby someone else can find a use for it. Basicly what it does is it finds the fightstyle you use and writes it in the debug box.

Procedure FindFightStyle; var fstyle : string; begin gametab(1); if findcolor(x, y, 2106253,574,252,639,292) then fstyle:='attack'; if findcolor(x, y, 2106253,659,252,724,292) then fstyle:='strength'; if findcolor(x, y, 2106253,574,305,639,344) then fstyle:='controlled'; if findcolor(x, y, 2106253,659,305,720,344) then fstyle:='defence'; writeln(fstyle); end;

Read full topic
